name: Circus Tyke Balance Hype
description:
Roll up, Roll up, people I vow, 

we have a spectacle on now!

BALANCING TYKE be aware, 

One man, three chairs, and a pole fair!

Can we make his job one tougher,

By adding time this task is much mucher!

Tyke, a man unfeared of doom;

Though, you'll see yourself very soon!

Controls :

A / Left Arrow - Lean to the LEFT

D / Right Arrow -  Lean to the RIGHT

Aim :

See how much you can up the ante, and still survive the deadly balancing pole show!
